#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long int n;
	cin>>n;
	int arr[n];
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>arr[i];
	//int diff[n]={0};
	int j,k,count=0;
	int max=arr[0];
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(arr[i]>max)
		{
			max=arr[i];
			continue;
		}
		else
		{
			for(j=0;j<i;j++)
			{
				if(arr[j]>arr[i])
				count++;
			}
		}
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
	return 0;
	
}
